iaik.x509

Class RawPublicKey

  • java.lang.Object
    • iaik.x509.PublicKeyInfo
      • iaik.x509.RawPublicKey
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ASN1Type, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.security.Key, java.security.PublicKey

    public class RawPublicKey
extends PublicKeyInfo
implements java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
    This class implements a raw, generic X.509 public key as may appear in an X.509 certificate or, for instance, PKCS#10 certificate request.

    When parsing the public key contained in a, e.g., certificate, method PublicKeyInfo.getPublicKey(ASN1Object) tries to instantiate a KeyFactory for the key algorithm. If no KeyFactory is available a generic raw public key is created allowing to get some information about the key (algorithm, encoding).

    Version:
    File Revision 29
    See Also:

        protected void decode(byte[] publicKey)

        Decodes a raw X509PublicKey, encoded in DER format.

        This method only keeps the key encoding.

        Specified by:
        decode in class PublicKeyInfo
        Parameters:
        publicKey - the public key as DER encoded ASN.1 object
        Throws:
        java.security.InvalidKeyException - if something is wrong with the encoding of the key

      • encode

        public byte[] encode()
        Returns the raw public key (not wrapped in a X.509 PublicKeyInfo) as DER encoded ASN.1 object.

        This method typically may not be used by an application. Rather it is used by the parent X.509 PublicKeyInfo.getEncoded() method for encoding the public key.

        Specified by:
        encode in class PublicKeyInfo
        Returns:
        a byte array holding the raw public key as a DER encoded ASN.1 data structure
